> "Okay okay, I'll go see what I can do there. Man, someone got up on the wrong side of the recover berth this morn'n.."

Legacy was about to ignore the last of the Autobot's comment when he
noted that this supposed Autobot was actually transmitting a
Decepticon energy signature. For a long moment Legacy examined the
sensor reading. He looked over at Talon as he transmitted over the
Maximal and Autobot frequencies, "There is a Decepticon energy
signature detected in close proximity of this base! I would suggest .
. . Strange, the energy signature has now become a Maximal one."

(TAG)

OOC: I would have done more, but Nightshift had already left the base
and is already at the Ark, before Legacy could respond to the (false)
Decepticon threat. :)

I wish you would have said that in the first post and then slowed that
down a bit, then we could all have had some fun with the
Decepticon/Autobot signature confusion thing, it would have been great
RP for a few posts. :)

However I did want to give some sort of response. >:)

Preston
